mapper.insert: insert into productTBL(productId, productName, productPrice, productDesc, productImg) values (seq_productTBL.nextval, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productDesc}, #{productImgStr})
mapper.select: select productId, productName, productPrice, productDesc, productImg as productImgStr, productDate from productTBL
select productId, productName, productPrice, productDesc, productImg as productImgStr, productDate from productTBL where productId = #{productId}
